name: redd-todo
description: ReDD Do - keep your goals in sight and get back to what you wanted to do

scripts.tauri:build:mas-app: CI=true tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin --bundles app --config src-tauri/tauri.appstore.temp.conf.json
scripts.build:mac: tauri build --target universal-apple-darwin && node scripts/collect-distribution-artifacts.js --target universal-apple-darwin && node scripts/build-mas-package.js --skip-tauri-build --optional
scripts.build:win: tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --no-bundle && tauri bundle --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --bundles nsis,msi --config src-tauri/tauri.microsoftstore.conf.json && node scripts/collect-distribution-artifacts.js --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && node scripts/verify-windows-store-artifacts.js
scripts.build:linux: tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && node scripts/collect-distribution-artifacts.js --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
